alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 02 at 11:02PM MST until December 03 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. Gusts up to 75 mph will be possible across the higher terrain. * WHERE...East facing slopes of the Rampart Range and Pikes Peak. Strong gusts may extend eastward into portions of the I-25 corridor, especially near the Air Force Academy area. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft
